options.content:
Domain ${__org.name}
Windows server : $server

panels.description:
Show the total availability time for the last 7 days

* Agent ping is a test from prometheus server to the agent.  
* Uptime is the system uptime on the server. 

The server can still be running, while prometheus cannot join the server agent.  
If the server is really unavailable, both statuses will be red / down

To allow a large relative time without losing precision, the time() interval must be explicitly set to 5m
panels.title: Availability history: $server

panels.description:
* user: usage for application processes (normal)  
* nice: same as user with a lower priority  
* system + *irq: usage for the kernel (abnormal, hardware or driver related)  
* iowait : waiting time (abnormal, drive or network latency)  
* steal: virtualized cpu waiting for real cpu (abnormal, too many VM)  

More information can be found here : https://www.kernel.org/doc/html/latest/admin-guide/cpu-load.html
panels.title: CPU $cpu usage

list.description: Datasource to use for this dashboard
list.name: dsdashboard
